"A.P.238/4/9/12:00": "Hmm, seems like there's a slightly stronger enemy ahead."
"Well, since you and Lisa are handling it, we'll finish it off quickly."
"Ah, by the way, Lisa had something to ask you."
"Please don't read too much into this. It's a simple question."
"For someone else? For yourself, maybe for revenge? Or is there another reason?"
"Well, I don't really care. Forget I asked."
"Lisa trusts her own eyes, but she has no idea what to think when she looks at you."
"That's why I've been keeping an eye on you, but Lisa's still confused."
"But I don't have to understand. If I don't understand, I'll just watch you closer than ever."
"Aw, are you not going to answer? I'll get bored with you if I know the answer."
"For now, Lisa just wants to enjoy this funny feeling."
"Now, while we were talking, other groups have caught up. It sets my heart racing."
"Well, Lisa's still going to win. Heheh, heheheh."
